languages.text: "Настоятель Нигмус не слишком рвется в бой. Кажется, исподволь он готовит Орден к проигрышу в диспуте и пытается избежать возмущения среди братии".
"Prelate Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss of this dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the priesthood."
languages.original_text: "Настоятель Нигмус не слишком рвется в бой. Кажется, исподволь он готовит Орден к проигрышу в диспуте и пытается избежать возмущения среди братии".

traits.locale_text: "Abbot Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss in the dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the brotherhood."
"Abbot Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss in the dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the brotherhood."
"Prelate Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss of this dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the brotherhood."
"Prelate Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss of this dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the brotherhood."
"Prelate Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss of this dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the priesthood."
"Prelate Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss of this dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the priesthood."

languages.text: “尼格穆斯教长对这场冲突似乎不太关心。他正在巧妙地让重锤修会慢慢接受失败的前景，努力避免在信徒之中引起骚动。”
languages.original_text: "Prelate Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss of this dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the priesthood."

traits.locale_text: “尼格穆斯教长对这场冲突似乎不太关心。他正在巧妙地让重锤修会慢慢接受失败的前景，努力避免在信徒之中引起骚动。”

languages.text: «El prelado Nigmus no parece muy dado a luchar. Parece que está preparando con sutileza a la Orden para la pérdida de la disputa, para prevenir las protestas de la hermandad».
languages.original_text: "Prelate Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss of this dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the priesthood."

traits.locale_text: «El prelado Nigmus no parece muy dado a luchar. Parece que está preparando con sutileza a la Orden para la pérdida de la disputa, para prevenir las protestas de la hermandad».

languages.text: 「上級聖職者のニグマスは戦いにあまり乗り気ではないようです。彼はこの論争での敗北に備え、修道会にそれとなく準備をさせ、聖職内での騒動を避けようとしているようです」
languages.original_text: "Prelate Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss of this dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the priesthood."

traits.locale_text: 「上級聖職者のニグマスは戦いにあまり乗り気ではないようです。彼はこの論争での敗北に備え、修道会にそれとなく準備をさせ、同胞団内での騒動を避けようとしているようです」
「上級聖職者のニグマスは戦いにあまり乗り気ではないようです。彼はこの論争での敗北に備え、修道会にそれとなく準備をさせ、同胞団内での騒動を避けようとしているようです」

languages.text: « Le prélat Nigmus ne semble pas décidé à se battre. D'aucuns pensent qu'il prépare subtilement l'Ordre à essuyer un échec et qu'il espère avant tout éviter un tollé au sein du clergé. »
languages.original_text: "Prelate Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss of this dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the priesthood."

traits.locale_text: « Le prélat Nigmus ne semble pas décidé à se battre. D'aucuns pensent qu'il prépare subtilement l'Ordre à essuyer un échec et qu'il espère avant tout éviter un tollé au sein de la confrérie. »

languages.text: "Prälat Nigmus scheint nicht allzu versessen auf einen Streit zu sein. Es scheint, als würde er den Orden unauffällig darauf vorbereiten, dass sie diesen Disput verlieren werden. Er will einen Aufschrei innerhalb der Priesterschaft vermeiden."
languages.original_text: "Prelate Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss of this dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the priesthood."

traits.locale_text: "Prälat Nigmus scheint nicht allzu versessen auf einen Streit zu sein. Es scheint, als würde er den Orden unauffällig darauf vorbereiten, dass sie diesen Disput verlieren werden. Er will einen Aufschrei innerhalb der Priesterschaft vermeiden."

"Prälat Nigmus scheint nicht allzu versessen auf einen Streit zu sein. Es scheint, als würde er den Orden unauffällig darauf vorbereiten, dass sie diesen Disput verlieren werden. Er will einen Aufschrei in der Bruderschaft vermeiden."

languages.text: "Piskopos Nigmus, dövüşmeye pek de meraklı durmuyor. Görünüşe göre Tarikat'ı fark ettirmeden bu tartışmayı kaybetmeye hazırlıyor ve rahiplikte olası bir kargaşadan sakınmaya çalışıyor."
languages.original_text: "Prelate Nigmus does not seem to be too keen on fighting. It seems that he is subtly preparing the Order for the loss of this dispute and is trying to avoid an uproar in the priesthood."
